content:
I'll draft RFQ templates focusing on our key requirements. One additional supplier to consider is Amlogic S905Y2:

1. RFQ Key Points:
- Processing power for real-time AI interactions
- Power efficiency for battery life
- Built-in security features for child data protection
- Educational certification compatibility
- Development tool support

2. Technical Requirements:
- ARM Mali GPU for visual learning features
- Minimum 2GB RAM support
- Secure boot capability
- Power consumption under 2W
- Temperature management for child safety

3. Business Requirements:
- 100-250 unit initial order
- 4-6 week lead time
- Sample availability
- Technical support during development

Would you like me to prepare the detailed RFQ documents for all three suppliers?
